abstract: Major stock indexes close lower and end week of subdued trading, although month of February in retrospect proved strong for stock in United States.
lead_paragraph: The Dow Jones industrial average and S.&P. 500 both hit new highs, but reports showing slower-than-estimated growth in the U.S. gave traders pause on Friday.

headline.main: Hot Month for Markets Goes Out on Chilly Note
headline.print_headline: Hot Month for Markets Goes Out on Chilly Note

snippet: The Dow Jones industrial average and S.&P. 500 both hit new highs, but reports showing slower-than-estimated growth in the U.S. gave traders pause on Friday.
